channel.title: Bush Politics Politic on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Bush Politics Politic on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: bummer
item.description: yep. what is frustrating to me is the people who are all “oh yea see bush is right” and all this crap about politics when they just started paying attention it a week ago. then they gloat and act like they were right all along. well I just welcome them to the world which they have helped create. hopefully they will enjoy it as much as I will. mmm, candy
